replies.body: **Emoji's in league please **
When will yoick get a new skin, sick off riot making so many annie skins.
Yorick is getting a game change/Visual update sometime in the 'future'. So they're not making a skin for him until that's done.
That'll probably get released with a skin too anyway.
Hey Riot, In any chance Ultimate Skins Go on sale?

I believe the previous 3 Ultimate skins went on sale on release. But release sales don't happen anymore. I'm uncertain if Ultimate skins will ever go on sale again but keeping an eye out for news on sales is the best way to find out.
Damn would be great if it goes sale even once a year!!!{{item:3151}}

Well, Challenger Skins were not supposed to be on sale, yet somehow one did end up going on sale, so you never know. Riot might "accidentally" make a Ult skin on sale, through i doubt the chances are big.
May be one day there will be a new tier of skin: Super Ultimate.
Rito said (Although they're good at changing things) that they wouldn't go on sale again after the release sale.
Archduke Nasus is never going to go on sale {{item:3070}}

Is there anyway I can get a refund on a champion and skin I brought. I was kinda drunk you could say when I brought them and was actually saving my RP for when Aurelian sol. I have used all three of my refunds cause I had no clue how important they wee and my friends told me I get 3 new ones each year. Please help me it really annoys me knowing that I have nocturne and eternum nocturne and how I'll never use them cause I hate nocturne. Please help me

Hey man, depending on how long you bought them ago you can send a ticket to riot, draw them a picture of a champion with paint (attach it), explain your circumstances and request a refund. 

Good luck!
Skins and sales are like cool and all, but pls when do u release Aurelion Sol!?
Aurelion Sol Just Got Realeased Today
Hey Riot, Do U Think There Will Be Anymore Ultimate Skins?
{{champion:6}}, new skin please.
Gonna wait for Sion skin :D {{champion:14}}
Can't wait to buy Project lucian

please send out a knew project skin for {{champion:35}} he's got one  cool one but how cool would it be to have project shaco
Hey  Riot, will you be putting Sandstorm Ekko on sail this year? and if so when? Thanks!
